fields.infoText:
## You can use this form to claim back VAT on supplied goods and services. ##

Your claim must be submitted within 3 years of the date of purchase.

You need to make sure you have everything you need ready to make this claim.

For each invoice you want to claim for, you’ll need to provide:
* the date of the invoice
* the supplier's VAT Registration Number
* a brief description of the goods or service supplied
* who the invoice was addressed to
* the amount of VAT paid

Your claim must be for a period of at least one calendar month and must end on the last day of a calendar month.

If you want to make a claim for less than £100, it must cover a period of at least 12 months.

declarationSection.description: By entering your details below you confirm on behalf of your organisation that:

fields.infoText:
* any claim for VAT refund on goods and services are for non-business activities
* your organisation doesn’t make goods and doesn’t provide services that are subject to VAT
* your organisation isn’t registered for VAT, and if requested, you will produce tax invoices to prove this

What happens next

We will pay any VAT refund due to the bank account you provided in your claim.

[Contact the VAT Helpline](https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-revenue-customs/contact/vat-enquiries) if you need to make changes to your claim or speak to someone about your claim.
